程序包 com.cutefool.commons.orm.support

类 BasicOperations<DTO,​E,​ID,​R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cutefool.commons.orm.support.BasicOperations<DTO,​E,​ID,​R>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IConditionOperations<E>, IOperations<DTO,​E,​ID,​R>, IRepository<E,​ID>, Validator<DTO,​ID>
    @Transactional(readOnly=true,
               rollbackFor=java.lang.RuntimeException.class)
public abstract class BasicOperations<DTO,​E,​ID,​R>
extends Object
implements IOperations<DTO,​E,​ID,​R>
